item.title: Visual Design Showcase
item.description: Overview I’m taking the class of “Data Visualization and Information Aesthetics” at Parsons School of Design. In this class, I will create a total of four posters and two interactive visualization projects. In the first half of the semester, I created three posters for specific topics such as Man-made product, Nature and Society. I learned the basic techniques of data visualization in a series of design processes from ideation, source data discovery to iterative prototyping.

item.title: Creative Coding Showcase
item.description: #1: Immersive Music Visualizer I imagined the space-trip and a scene in which we encountered unknown objects. I coded a sound visualizer which enables music experience more immersive in the 3D space. When the user upload the music, this visualizer converts three music parameters into visualized elements. Users can manipulate the viewpoint in the 3D space. BPM (Beats Per Minutre) -> Velocity of balls Sound Volume -> Dynamics of balls and the plane Length of Music -> The number of random colored balls Project Information Phase / Period Concept, Design, Build 10 / 2018 (1 Day) Team / Role Sole Project Maker, Coder Method / Technology Iterative coding html5, css3, javascript, three.
